name: Freshman Leadership Advisory Council
description:
Check out www.floverview.com for more information!

Who or What is FLAC?

We are the Freshman Leadership Advisory Council. We are the over-arching body of the eighteen official FLOs. Since FLOs are members of FLAC, we coordinate recruitment between them, create events, establish rules, and uphold standards to ensure every FLO provides a quality experience.

FLAC is not a FLO. We are a staff of a few members to keeps things running smoothly throughout the year.

What is a FLO?

A FLO is a Freshmen Leadership Organization. There are eighteen at Texas A&M University-College Station. FLOs have frequent meetings, service projects, and programs like most other organizations on campus. However, what helps make FLOs different from other organizations on campus is the freshmen focus. It's the ultimate goal of each FLO staff to help ensure that freshmen members have a successful first year of college.

Many FLOs choose to focus on specifics aspect of university life, such as a specific college or interest. FLOs also uniquely interact through All-FLO events, which are social gatherings, competitions, and service events that occur throughout the year. 

Official member organizations include: AFC, ASSIST, FLE, FAST, FLARE, FLIC, FLiP, Fish Aides, Fish Council, FLED, FREE, FORME, FLEX, FLOC, MSC ALOT, MSC FiSH, MSC FLI, PREP

 

Where do I start the application process?

To start the application process, please visit: https://flos.tamu.edu/

The system will not be open until the conclusion of the All-FLO Informational on August 28th.

Important Dates:

-All-FLO Informational Tuesday, August 28, 2018 (*Doors open at 6:15*)(7PM-8:30PM in Rudder Auditorium)

-Applications Released Conclusion of All-FLO Informational on evening of Tuesday, August 28, 2018

-Applications Due Friday, September 7, 2018 (8AM - 5PM in Koldus 144)

-Interview Notification E-Mails sent Sunday, September 9, 2018 (Noon)

-Interview Signups Sunday, September 9, 2018 (2PM - 6PM in Rudder Exhibit Hall)

-FLO Placement Notification E-Mails Sent Sunday, September 16, 2018

FAQs

For questions about how to join a FLO or a copy of our FAQs please refer to the "Documents" section below.
summary: FLAC is the Freshmen Leadership Advisory Council. The goal of FLAC is to maintain the integrity of the freshman leadership experience within its member organizations (FLOs).
